rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open-air central courtyard that allows natural light and ventilation, following Vastu principles for harmony.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows that open onto the courtyard, ensuring ample light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with Mediterranean style finishes and floor-to-ceiling windows for a bright workspace.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen with a semi-open design that provides access to the courtyard.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A smaller guest bedroom that complements the overall Mediterranean design.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed bathroom with modern fixtures and a focus on comfort.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The primary entrance designed to be in the north-east direction as per Vastu principles, ensuring a welcoming energy.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: An auxiliary entrance for service and utility access on the south-west side.

openings.name: Roof Exit
openings.description: A secured exit leading from the villa to an adjacent terrace, designed for emergency egress.
